metadata.title: CVE-2024-24855 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's scsi device driver inlpfc_unregister_fcf_rescan() function. This can result in a null pointerdereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of serviceissue.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
